content.en: Neural network stability: Researchers have been investigating the characteristics and stability of neural networks with different types of delays. They have used various algorithms, such as Halanay-type inequalities, linear matrix inequalities (LMIs), Lyapunov methods, and coincidence degree theory, to analyze and ensure convergence, stability, and the existence of periodic solutions in these networks. These findings contribute to our understanding of how neural networks with delays can be effectively utilized in various applications.
content.da: Neural netværks stabilitet: Forskere har undersøgt egenskaberne og stabiliteten af neurale netværk med forskellige typer forsinkelser. De har anvendt forskellige algoritmer, såsom Halanay-type uligheder, lineære matrixuligheder (LMIs), Lyapunov metoder og koincidens teorier, for at analysere og sikre konvergens, stabilitet og eksistensen af periodiske løsninger i disse netværk. Disse fund bidrager til vores forståelse af, hvordan neurale netværk med forsinkelser effektivt kan anvendes i forskellige applikationer.
